thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Materialise NV Reports Qtrly ‍Net Profit Of 0.03 EUR Per Diluted Share​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Materialise NV Reports Qtrly ‍Net Profit Of 0.03 EUR Per Diluted Share​
text:
March 6 (Reuters) - Materialise Nv:
* MATERIALISE NV - QTRLY TOTAL REVENUE INCREASED 42.1% FROM Q4 OF 2016 TO 44,733 KEUR
* MATERIALISE NV QTRLY ‍NET PROFIT 0.03 EUR PER DILUTED SHARE​
* MATERIALISE NV - SEES 2018 CONSOLIDATED REVENUE BETWEEN 180,000 KEUR - 185,000 KEUR AND ADJUSTED EBITDA BETWEEN 22,000 KEUR - 25,000 KEUR
* MATERIALISE NV - ‍EXPECT 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS TO BE “PARTICULARLY STRONG” IN Q3 AND “EVEN STRONGER” IN Q4​
* MATERIALISE NV - ‍EXPECT DEFERRED REVENUE FROM ANNUAL LICENSES AND MAINTENANCE IN 2018 TO INCREASE BY AMOUNT BETWEEN 2,000 KEUR TO 4,000 KEUR​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
